automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_follow_2025'
alias: Office WLED Living Room Follow
description: "When Office WLED turns on, stage living room and then brighten Office WLED"
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: state
    entity_id: light.wled
    from: 'off'
    to: 'on'
conditions: []
action:
  - delay: '00:00:02'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.living_room_2
    data:
      brightness_pct: 70
  - delay: '00:00:03'
  - service: light.turn_on
    target:
      entity_id: light.wled
    data:
      brightness: 255
